name: moneyquest-v3
description: GDPR & SOC 2 Type II compliant personal finance web application

scripts.install:packages: npm install --prefix packages/website && npm install --prefix packages/mobile && npm install --prefix packages/backend && npm install --prefix packages/shared && npm install --prefix packages/infrastructure
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:website && npm run build:infrastructure
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:website && npm run lint:mobile && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:shared
scripts.lint:shared: echo 'Shared package linting not configured yet'
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:website && npm run typecheck:mobile && npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:shared
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run cdk:deploy --prefix packages/infrastructure
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run cdk:deploy --prefix packages/infrastructure

author: MoneyQuestV3 Team
